title: Store: no payment possible
content:
I want to purchase the Pixel 5 in the german Google Shop.
Its not possible.

First, i tried with my Paypal account. It got removed because it "has been deleted", which is hilariously wrong.
Then i tried my credit card, but the transaction got declined: "Ein unerwarteter Fehler ist aufgetreten. Bitte versuchen Sie es sp√§ter erneut. [OR-PRAT-02]"
Of course it within my limits.

I am using my browser Firefox on PC and have FIDO2 activated. Maybe this is one of issues?
If anyone else has this problem too, have you tried using Paypal balance?
